TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ChartSerializer extends System.Object

summary.span: 启用 控件的序列化功能。

span.span: Enables serialization of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类公开为 根类的属性 。This class is exposed as the property of the root class. 序列化会保存图表的状态，还会提供将序列化数据加载到图表中的选项。Serialization saves the state of the chart and also provides the option to load the serialized data into the chart. 所有图表属性都可以保留，包括图表的数据。All chart properties can be persisted, including the chart's data. 此外，可以重置标记为要进行序列化的所有图表属性。In addition, all chart properties marked for serialization can be reset. 当管理用户定义的视图状态时，可以选择使用此类。This class can optionally be used when managing user-defined view state. 其中一种 `Load` 方法可用于加载视图状态，在 `Save` 设置视图状态时，可以使用其中一种方法。One of its `Load` methods can be used to load the view state, and one of the `Save` methods can be used when setting the view state. XML 或二进制格式可用于存储序列化数据。The XML or binary formats can be used to store serialized data. 默认情况下使用 XML，但你可以使用属性来更改格式 。XML is used by default, but you can change the format with the property. 分别使用和方法保存和加载图表 `Save` 属性 `Load` 。Chart properties are saved and loaded using the `Save` and `Load` methods, respectively. 请注意，将只保存具有非默认值的属性。Note that only properties with non-default values will be saved. 可以使用文件、流、 、 和对象保存和/或加载数据 。Data can be saved and/or loaded using a file, stream, , , and objects. 使用从、或类派生的对象保存和/或加载数据时 ，数据的格式必须是 XML。When saving and/or loading data using an object derived from the , , or classes, the format of the data must be XML. 以下列表描述了三种从基本到高级的技术，用于定义可序列化的数据。The following list describes three techniques, from basic to advanced, used to define serializable data. 请注意，也可以定义不可序列化的数据。Note that it is also possible to define non-serializable data. 下一段中描述了此方法。This technique is described in the next paragraph. - 使用 `Save` 和方法序列化 `Load` ，而无需指定任何可序列化的属性。Serialize the using the `Save` and `Load` methods, without specifying any serializable properties. 将序列化所有具有非默认值的图表属性，其中包括图表数据。All chart properties with non-default values, which includes chart data, will be serialized. - 序列化由属性指定的图表属性 。Serialize the chart properties specified by the property. 属性将要序列化的图表属性分组为不同的类别，如数据、外观等。The property groups the chart properties to be serialized into categories such as Data, Appearance, and so forth. 请注意，和对象的名称会 自动序列化; 然后，在加载时，序列化的数据将应用于现有的图表区域和序列。Note that the names of and objects are automatically serialized; the serialized data is then applied to existing chart areas and series when loaded. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此 属性由控件在内部实现， 作为 属性The property is implemented internally by the control as the property - 由属性指定的图表属性的序列化 。Serialization of chart properties specified by the property. 这是一个逗号分隔列表，其中列出了可序列化的所有图表属性。This is a comma-separated listing of all chart properties that are serializable. 将此属性设置为显式值后，开发人员负责指定要保存的所有属性。After this property is set to an explicit value, it is the responsibility of the developer to specify all properties to be saved. 换句话说，与 属性不同，图表区和系列的名称将不会自动保留。In other words, unlike the property, the names of chart areas and series will not be automatically persisted. 和 属性也可以结合使用。The and properties can also be used in conjunction. 但是，请确保在 设置时与自身连接，否则由属性指定的图表属性将被 重写。However, make sure that is concatenated with itself when being set, otherwise the chart properties specified by the property will be overridden. 若要禁止对某些属性进行序列化，请使用 属性。To prohibit certain properties from being serialized, use the property. 如果一个属性设置为可序列化且不可序列化（这在使用通配符时很常见），则 属性优先。When one property is set as serializable and non-serializable, which is common when wildcards are used, the property has precedence. 但是，优先顺序还取决于在指定属性时使用了多少个通配符。However, precedence also depends on how many wildcards were used when a property was specified. 默认情况下，可序列化属性在加载前将重置为其默认值。By default, serializable properties are reset to their defaults before they are loaded. 此行为可以使用 属性更改。This behavior can be changed using the property. 方法还可用于将图表属性显式重置为其默认值。The method can also be used to explicitly reset chart properties to their default values.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::SerializationContents Content { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::SerializationContents get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::SerializationContents value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取或设置要序列化的图表内容的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of chart content to be serialized.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值表示将在加载、保存或重置操作期间执行序列化的图表内容。

span.span: A enumeration value that represents the chart content that will be serialized during a load, save or reset operation.

value.span: 默认情况下，将保留所有非默认图表属性，包括数据。

span.span: By default, all non-default chart properties, including data, are persisted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，当调用任何和方法时，将序列化所有图表属性 `Save` `Load` 。By default, all chart properties will be serialized when any of the `Save` and `Load` methods are called. 若要更好地控制序列化的内容，请使用 属性。To provide more control over what is serialized, use the property. 请注意， 和 属性也可以与属性一起使用 。Note that the and properties can also be used along with the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 属性确定要序列化的图表特征（如 "外观"）的类型，实际上在内部实现为 属性。The property determines types of chart characteristics, such as "appearance", to be serialized, and is actually implemented internally as the property. 这意味着， 如果已连接，则设置属性并设置 属性将导致 重写属性值 。This means that setting the property and then setting the property will result in the property value being overridden, unless is concatenated. 有关此过程的示例，请参阅下面的示例代码。See the sample code below for an example of this procedure. 如果设置 属性，则所有 和 对象名称都将自动进行序列化; 这意味着，与图表区和序列有关的序列化数据将在加载时应用于现有对象。If you set the property, all and objects names will automatically be serialized; this means that serialized data that pertains to chart areas and series will be applied to existing objects when loaded. 设置此属性将影响所有加载、保存和重置操作。Setting this property affects all load, save and reset operations.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::SerializationFormat Format { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::SerializationFormat get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::SerializationFormat value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取或设置序列化图表时所使用的格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the format used when the chart is serialized.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值表示已序列化的数据的格式。

span.span: A enumeration value that represents the format of the serialized data.
The default value is XML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据可以采用 XML 格式或二进制格式序列化。Data can be serialized in either an XML or binary format. 二进制格式是紧凑的，使用的存储比 XML 少。Binary format is compact, and takes less storage than XML. 不过，XML 是一个文本格式，它是用户可读的。XML, however, is a text format that is human-readable. 保存或加载序列化数据时，格式必须是 XML。When you save or load serialized data, the format must be XML.

returns.span: 一个 值，表示可序列化或不可序列化的类和/或属性名称。

span.span: A value that represents the serializable or non-serializable class and/or property names.

summary.span: 将已序列化的数据加载到 控件。

span.span: Loads serialized data into the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Load(class System.IO.Stream stream) cil managed

param.name: stream
param.span: 一个从 类派生的对象，如 对象。

span.span: An object derived from the class, for example, a object.

summary.span: 将已序列化的数据从派生自 类的对象加载到控件。

span.span: Loads serialized data into the control from an object derived from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法可将序列化数据加载到 控件中。Call this method to load serialized data into the control. 当发生加载操作时，默认情况下，可序列化的属性将首先重置为其默认值，然后将其设置为持久值（如果已保存）。When a load operation occurs, serializable properties are, by default, first reset to their default values before they are set to the persisted values, if saved. 若要更改此行为，请使用 属性。To change this behavior, use the property. 默认情况下，将加载所有序列化的图表属性。By default, all serialized chart properties will be loaded. 若要加载特定的序列化属性，请 在加载数据之前设置或属性。To load specific serialized properties, set the , or properties before loading the data. 请注意，在使用方法保存数据时 `Save` ，只会对具有非默认值的属性进行实际序列化。Note that when data is saved using a `Save` method, only those properties that have non-default values are actually serialized.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Load(class System.IO.TextReader reader) cil managed

param.name: reader
param.span: 从抽象的 类派生的读取器，如 。

span.span: A reader, such as , that is derived from the abstract class.

summary.span: 将已序列化的数据从派生自 类的读取器对象加载到控件。

span.span: Loads serialized data into the control from a reader object that derives from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法可将序列化数据加载到 控件中。Call this method to load serialized data into the control. 当发生加载操作时，默认情况下，可序列化属性首先重置为默认值，然后将其设置为持久值（如果已保存）。When a load operation occurs, by default the serializable properties are first reset to their default values before they are set to the persisted values, if saved. 若要更改此行为，请使用 属性。To change this behavior, use the property. 默认情况下，将加载所有序列化的图表属性。By default, all serialized chart properties will be loaded. 通过设置 或 属性，可以加载一组特定属性。By setting the , or properties, a specific set of properties can be loaded. 如果使用此定义，请注意，由属性设置的格式 必须是 XML。If you use this definition, note that the format, which is set by the property, must be XML.

span.span: If a relative path is specified, the path will be relative to the current directory.

summary.span: 将已保存到磁盘的序列化数据加载到 控件。

span.span: Loads serialized data saved to disk into the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法可将序列化数据加载到 控件中。Call this method to load serialized data into the control. 当发生加载操作时，默认情况下，可序列化的属性将首先重置为其默认值，然后将其设置为持久值（如果已保存）。When a load operation occurs, serializable properties are, by default, first reset to their default values before they are set to the persisted values, if saved. 若要更改此行为，请使用 属性。To change this behavior, use the property. 默认情况下，将加载所有序列化的图表属性。By default, all serialized chart properties will be loaded. 若要加载特定的序列化属性，请 在加载数据之前设置或属性。To load specific serialized properties, set the , or properties before loading the data. 请注意，在使用方法保存数据时 `Save` ，只会对具有非默认值的属性进行实际序列化。Note that when data is saved using a `Save` method, only those properties that have non-default values are actually serialized.

summary.span: 将已序列化的数据从派生自 类的对象加载到控件。

span.span: Loads serialized data into the control from an object derived from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法可将序列化数据加载到 控件中。Call this method to load serialized data into the control. 当发生加载操作时，默认情况下，可序列化属性首先重置为默认值，然后将其设置为持久值（如果已保存）。When a load operation occurs, by default serializable properties are first reset to their default values before they are set to the persisted values, if saved. 若要更改此行为，请使用 属性。To change this behavior, use the property. 默认情况下，将加载所有序列化的图表属性。By default, all serialized chart properties will be loaded. 如果设置 或 属性，可以加载一组特定属性。If you set the , or properties, a specific set of properties can be loaded. 使用此定义时，格式必须为 XML;可以用属性更改格式 。When you use this definition, the format must be XML; the format can be changed with the property. 处理 XML 格式文本文件时，为简单起见，请改用 方法。When you work with XML format text files, for simplicity use the method instead.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ NonSerializableContent { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.NonSerializableContent : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置不进行序列化的图表属性。

span.span: Gets or sets the chart properties that will not be serialized.

value.span: 一个用逗号分隔的 表达式，表示不进行序列化的图表属性。

span.span: A comma-separated expression that represents the chart properties that will not be serialized.
The syntax is "Class.Property[,Class.Property]".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下 `Save` ，当调用和方法时，将序列化所有图表属性 `Load` 。By default all chart properties will be serialized when the `Save` and `Load` methods are called. 您可以使用 属性来限制要序列化的图表特征，以及 和 属性。You can use the property to limit chart characteristics to be serialized, along with the and properties. 此属性确定不会序列化哪些图表特征。This property determines which chart characteristics will not be serialized. 可以在字符串表达式中使用通配符，其方式与 属性相同。Wildcards can be used in the string expression, in the same manner as the property. 例如，若要从序列化中排除所有图表 `BackColor` 属性，请将此属性设置为 "" \* 。背景色 "。For example, to exclude all chart `BackColor` properties from serialization, set this property to "\*.BackColor". 有时，可以将属性设置为序列化和不序列化，这在使用通配符时很常见。Sometimes, a property can be set to be both serialized and not serialized, which is common when wildcards are used. 与表达式相比，表达式的优先级较低 。The expression has a lower priority when compared to the expression. 但请注意，使用通配符的字符串表达式的权重更小。However, note that less weight is given to string expressions that use wildcards. 例如，如果将 属性设置为 "" \* 。背景色 "，并将 属性设置为 ，则 `BackColor` 将序列化除对象之外的所有属性。For example, if the property is set to "\*.BackColor" and the property is set to , all `BackColor` properties except for objects will be serialized. 如果 已设置该属性，则优先级取决于表达式中使用的通配符数量 。If the property has been set, the priority depends on how many wild cards are used in the expression. 例如，将属性设置 为 将导致 属性包含 "" \* 。Back \* "表达式。For example, setting the property to will result in the property containing a "\*.Back\*" expression. 如果该 属性设置为 "" \* 。后退 \* "，所有 `Back\*` 图表属性（例如 `BackColor` 、 `BackGradient` 等）仍将进行序列化。If the property is set to "\*.Back\*", all `Back\*` chart properties, such as `BackColor`, `BackGradient`, and so forth, will still be serialized. 这是因为在 与属性进行比较时，属性值具有更高的优先级 。This is because the property value has higher priority when compared to the property. 此属性会影响所有 save、load 和 reset 操作。This property affects all save, load and reset operations.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Reset() cil managed

summary.span: 重置所有标记为要进行序列化的图表属性。

span.span: Resets all chart properties marked for serialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，此方法将所有图表属性重置为其默认值。By default, this method resets all chart properties to their default values. 若要将重置的图表属性限制为默认值，请使用 、 和 属性。To limit the chart properties that are reset to their defaults, use the , and properties. 请注意，当 `Load` 使用方法并且 属性设置为时，也会自动调用此方法 `true` 。Note that this method is also called automatically when a `Load` method is used and the property is set to `true`.

summary.span: 保存具有非默认值的图表属性。

span.span: Saves chart properties that have non-default values.

summary.span: 可以对所有图表属性进行序列化，其中包括数据。

span.span: All chart properties can be serialized; this includes data.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Save(class System.IO.Stream stream) cil managed

param.name: stream
param.span: 从 类派生的用于保存图表属性的对象，如 。

span.span: An object derived from the class, such as , that is used to save chart properties.

summary.span: 将具有非默认值的图表数据和属性保存到派生自 类的对象。

span.span: Saves chart data and properties with non-default values to an object that derives from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，当调用此方法时，将序列化所有具有非默认值的图表属性，这些属性包含数据点。By default, all chart properties with non-default values, which includes data points, will be serialized when this method is called. 若要控制要序列化的图表特征，请使用 、 和 属性。To control chart characteristics to be serialized, use the , and properties. 如果使用此方法将外观属性保存为模板，请确保 先将对象的属性设置为， `true` 然后再调用此方法。If this method is used to save appearance properties as a template, make sure that the property of the object is first set to `true` before calling this method. 作为模板的图表序列化与非模板序列化的发生方式不同;模板序列化着重于外观属性。Serialization of a chart as a template occurs differently from non-template serialization; template serialization concentrates on Appearance properties. 序列化模板时， 可以使用方法加载模板，以提供图表的外观属性。When a template is serialized, the method can be used to load the template, to provide the Appearance properties for a chart. 模板可用于模拟自定义调色板。Templates can be used to simulate custom palettes.

span.span: Saves chart data and properties with non-default values to the given object that is derived from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，当调用此方法时，将序列化所有具有非默认值的图表属性，这些属性包含数据点。By default, all chart properties with non-default values, which includes data points, will be serialized when this method is called. 若要控制序列化哪些图表特征，请使用 、 和 属性。To control which chart characteristics are serialized, use the , and properties. 使用此定义时，格式必须为 XML;可以通过属性设置格式 。When you use this definition, the format must be XML; the format can be set with the property.

summary.span: 将具有非默认值的图表数据和属性保存到给定文件中。

span.span: Saves chart data and properties with non-default values to the given file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，当调用此方法时，将序列化所有具有非默认值的图表属性，这些属性包含数据点。By default, all chart properties with non-default values, which includes data points, will be serialized when this method is called. 若要控制要序列化的图表特征 ，请使用、 和 属性。To control chart characteristics to be serialized use the , and properties. 默认情况下，数据以 XML 格式保存。By default data is saved in an XML format. 若要以二进制格式保存数据，请使用 属性。To save the data in a binary format, use the property. 请注意，必须为存储文件的目录启用写入权限。Note that Write permissions must be enabled for the directory in which the file is stored. 默认情况下，这是应用程序的 Bin 文件夹。By default, this is the Bin folder of the application. 如果使用此方法将外观属性保存为模板，请确保 先将属性设置为， `true` 然后再调用此方法。If this method is being used to save Appearance properties as a template, make sure that the property is first set to `true` before calling this method. 作为模板的图表序列化与非模板序列化的方式不同，主要是因为模板序列化会集中于外观属性。Serialization of a chart as a template proceeds differently from non-template serialization, primarily because template serialization concentrates on Appearance properties. 序列化模板时， 可以使用方法加载模板，以提供图表的外观属性。When a template is serialized, the method can be used to load the template, to provide the Appearance properties for a chart. 模板可用于模拟自定义调色板。Templates can be used to simulate custom palettes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Save(class System.Xml.XmlWriter writer) cil managed

param.name: writer
param.span: 一个从 派生的用于保存 属性的对象。

span.span: An object derived from used to save properties.

summary.span: 将具有非默认值的图表数据和属性保存到派生自 类的给定对象中。

span.span: Saves chart data and properties with non-default values to the given object that is derived from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，当调用此方法时，将序列化所有具有非默认值的图表属性，这些属性包含数据点。By default, all chart properties with non-default values, which includes data points, will be serialized when this method is called. 若要控制序列化哪些图表特征，请使用 、 和 属性。To control which chart characteristics are serialized, use the , and properties. 使用此定义时，格式必须为 XML;可以用属性更改格式 。When you use this definition, the format must be XML; the format can be changed with the property. 处理 XML 格式文本文件时，为简单起见，请改用 方法。When you work with XML format text files, for simplicity use the method instead.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SerializableContent { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SerializableContent : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置可以序列化的图表属性。

span.span: Gets or sets the chart properties that can be serialized.

value.span: 一个用逗号分隔的 表达式，表示要序列化的图表属性。

span.span: A comma-separated expression that represents the chart properties to be serialized.
The syntax is "Class.Property[,Class.Property]".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下 `Save` ，当调用和方法时，将序列化所有图表属性 `Load` 。By default all chart properties will be serialized when the `Save` and `Load` methods are called. 您可以使用 属性来限制要序列化的图表特征，以及 和 属性。You can use the property to limit chart characteristics to be serialized, along with the and properties. 属性决定将序列化哪些图表特征。The property determines which chart characteristics will be serialized. 可以在字符串表达式中使用通配符，其方式与 属性相同。Wildcards can be used in the string expression, in the same manner as the property. 例如，若要序列化所有图表 `BackColor` 属性，请将此属性设置为 "\*"。背景色 "。For example, to serialize all chart `BackColor` properties, set this property to "\*.BackColor". 如果 指定了和/或 子属性，则 还必须指定所有和对象的名称， 以使持久化数据应用于现有 和 对象; 即，必须指定 "Series.Name" 和 "ChartArea.Name" 表达式。If and/or child properties are specified, then the names of all and objects must be also specified to enable the persisted data to be applied to existing and objects; that is, you must specify "Series.Name" and "ChartArea.Name" expressions. 有关此过程的示例，请参阅下面的示例代码。See the sample code below for an example of this procedure. 同样，如果使用多个图表区，则 还必须保存所有绘图的属性 。Similarly, if multiple chart areas are being used, the property of all plotted must also be saved. 有时，可以将属性设置为序列化和不序列化，这在使用通配符时很常见。Sometimes, a property can be set to be both serialized and not serialized, which is common when wildcards are used. 与表达式相比，表达式的优先级较低 。The expression has a lower priority when compared to the expression. 但请注意，使用通配符的字符串表达式的权重更小。However, note that less weight is given to string expressions that use wildcards. 例如，如果将 属性设置为 "\*"。背景色 "，并将 属性设置为 ，则 `ackColor` 将序列化除对象之外的所有 B 属性。For example, if the property is set to "\*.BackColor" and the property is set to , all B`ackColor` properties except for objects will be serialized. 如果设置了 属性，将在 内部设置该属性。If you set the property, the property will be set internally. 如果 已设置该属性，但需要序列化另一个属性，请确保 在指定该额外属性时连接属性。If the property is already set but another property needs to be serialized, make sure to concatenate the property when specifying that extra property. 有关此过程的示例，请参阅下面的示例代码。See the sample code below for an example of this procedure. 此属性会影响所有 save、load 和 reset 操作。This property affects all save, load and reset operations.
